text: uge vadanata savan dun suleyiman mada sinahavak pamin, “mage deviyane! oba ma kerehida, mage demavpiyan kerehida, laba dun obage varaprasadayanta (obata) ma krtagna vimata dayava pahala karanu mænava! oba sæhimata pat viya hæki dæhæmi karanavanda mata kala (hæki bhagyaya ma hata laba di) dayava pahala kara, obage dayava magin obage honda vahalungen mavada ekatu kara harinu mænava!” yayi prarthana kaleya
